movie.title: Hulk
movie.description_intro: Bruce is an ordinary Gamma expert who one day gets blasted with radiation and somehow survives. But in the process a monster was born. Now whenever he gets angry he grows bigger and stronger until he is no longer Bruce Banner. He becomes The Hulk
movie.description_full: Bruce is an ordinary Gamma expert who one day gets blasted with radiation and somehow survives. But in the process a monster was born. Now whenever he gets angry he grows bigger and stronger until he is no longer Bruce Banner. He becomes The Hulk

movies.title: She's All That
movies.summary: She's All That is your typical high school prom king and queen story and the run in defending the star status in the upcoming election. High school hottie, Zack Siler is dumped by his prom-queen girlfriend, the equally attractive and extremely popular, Taylor Vaughan who fell for a second-hand world reject TV soap star who she met over the spring break. Having been publicly dumped, Zack defends his discomposure by stating that Taylor is all make-up and wonder-bra and he can make any ordinary girl a prom queen with a similar package. His high-school buddy, Dean Sampson, engages him in a bet following this statement and picks the geeky looking Laney Boggs out of the crowd as the girl Zack must transform into the new prom queen. Zack agrees since he has no option, but as time passes and Laney begins to transform, Zack begins to find her attractive. While all that falls beautifully in place, it's not your typical fairy-tale. Throw in Dean Sampson to complicate the situation, as when he ...

movies.title: Jolly LLB 2
movies.summary: Jolly is a clumsy lawyer who is faced with representing the most critical court case of his career.
movies.description_full: Jolly is a clumsy lawyer who is faced with representing the most critical court case of his career.
movies.synopsis: Jolly is a clumsy lawyer who is faced with representing the most critical court case of his career.

movies.title: Freedom Fighters: The Ray
movies.summary: Taking place on the alternate Earth, Earth-X, a world where the Nazis won World War II, Ray and his friends Black Condor, Red Tornado, and a handful of others fight against Nazi-aligned versions of popular Arrowverse Heroes including Green Arrow, Flash, and Supergirl, for the freedom of the world.
movies.description_full: Taking place on the alternate Earth, Earth-X, a world where the Nazis won World War II, Ray and his friends Black Condor, Red Tornado, and a handful of others fight against Nazi-aligned versions of popular Arrowverse Heroes including Green Arrow, Flash, and Supergirl, for the freedom of the world.

movies.title: Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer
movies.title_english: Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer
movies.title_long: Fantastic 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer (2007)
movies.summary: Everything seems to be going great for the Fantastic Four. Reed and Sue are finally getting married, and things couldn't seem better. However, when the mysterious Silver Surfer crashes things, they learn that they will have to deal with an old foe, and the powerful planet eating Galactus.
